titles.title: Wounded Warrior Retention Act of 2009

A bill to establish requirements applicable across the military departments for the retention in the Armed Forces of members who seek to remain in the Armed Forces following injury or disability incurred in the line of duty in the Armed Forces.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 7/10/2009--Introduced. Wounded Warrior Retention Act of 2009 - Sets forth requirements applicable to the retention in the Armed Forces of members of the Armed Forces, including members of the National Guard or Reserve, who seek to remain in military service following an injury or disability suffered or incurred in the line of duty.
